labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: win10, latest canary. (Found by woopy#9146 (Not in the server) ).
data.actual_result: The server invite does not send, even after opening the DM, you have to send it again for it to work.
data.short_description: When trying to send an invite link through a right click to a person it would not send (The person needs to be someone you have never opened a DM with).
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click someone you've never talked in DM before - Send them an invite to a server.
